content: this is a very simple beanie that i designed for our beginning knitting classes - this is the ideal first knitting in the round experience or first pass at using double pointed needles only used for the decreases you do just a little ribbing at the beginning and then go back to stockinette stitch the beautiful yarns from urth make this really simple beanie amazing but any worsted weight yarn would work i made this pattern free to help new knitters so enjoy
